name: Killing In The Name Of... (Ludum Dare 44)
name_original: Killing In The Name Of... (Ludum Dare 44)
description:
You’re the shepherd of your flock. Of course peaceful island living comes at a price… Your God (enter your favorite deity’s name here) demands some offerings every once in a while, otherwise she or he will bring doom to your beautiful island by flooding it with hot lava.

You take the heavy burden upon you to select who your faithful priests will bring closer to your Lady/Lord. Ungrateful as they are, some of your people might get upset by the fact, that you are fulfilling your duty as a deeply religious leader and will try to tear down your churches!

You’d be wise to pick those first, as in your Gods eyes every life is equally expensive. Sounds might hint you towards these rascals, knocking down your sanctuaries.

Scroll left and right via the arrow-keys and select your sacrifices by clicking on them.
